attributes.action: reduce the amount of business rates charged to small shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most small shops are struggling to survive today because the business rates are so high. The government take approximately 20% of business rates that should only be for local use. Small shops will continue to close if the government do nothing to help them. Please sign this petition if you don't want to see your local shops vanish.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
